title: Luxurious Studio w/ City Views and Front Loading Washer&Dryers
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!
Tucked between San Francisco and San Jose, discover balanced living at Sofi Belmont Glen.
Choose from studio, one, two, and three bedroom apartments for rent in Belmont, CA, which have been recently renovated to provide you with the perfect home base in the Bay Area.
We’re close to major employers, including Google and Oracle.
Our renovated apartments include city views, a heated swimming pool, 24-hour fitness center, and a quiet location near hiking and biking trails.
Achieve work-life balance when you choose a cozy and sophisticated apartment at Sofi Belmont Glen.
In an effort to provide the best customer experience, we are now offering virtual tours, self-guided tours, and in-person tours by appointment only.
Contact us today to schedule your personalized experience.
